knimeNode.name: FastQC
knimeNode.shortDescription: A quality control tool for high throughput sequence data.

fullDescription.option: Print the version of the program and exit
Do not uncompress the output file after creating it.
Disable grouping of bases for reads >50bp. All reports will show data for every base in the read.
Sets an artificial lower limit on the length of the sequence to be shown in the report.
Bypasses the normal sequence file format detection and forces the program to use the specified format.
Specifies the number of files which can be processed simultaneously. Each thread will be allocated 250MB of memory
Specifies the length of Kmer to look for in the Kmer content module.

knimeNode.interactiveView: The generic view executing the entered JavaScript.

ports.inPort: Specifies a non-default file which contains the list of contaminants to screen overrepresented sequences against. The file must contain sets of named adapters in the form name[tab]sequence. [txt,tsv,csv,opt.]

Specifies a non-default file which contains the list of adapter sequences which will be explicity searched against the library. The file must contain sets of named contaminants in the form name[tab]sequence. [txt,tsv,csv,opt.]

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of FastQC.
The text sent to standard error during the execution of FastQC. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
